attributes.action: Order the Police to escort the coffins of servicemen/woman from RAF Lyneham to the Coroners office in Oxford
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If hundreds of police can escort the Olympic flame through London, then they should escort the coffins of the servicemen/women who made the ultimate sacrifice serving their country in Iraq and Afghanistan.They should be escorted from RAF Lyneham to the coroners office in Oxford.They gave their lives for this country and should be treated with respect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
